intro: Hunt your prey, escape your predator - the 1v1v1 party brawler. Pick from 12 shamans with unique abilities and special attacks. Three forces, one fight - who will prevail?
description:
Catching Spirits is a wild and explosive party game for everyone: easy to learn, hard to master!
This triangular brawler-platformer will push friendships to their limits.
Only one rule: catch or be caught!
Three elements, one winner, who will prevail?

Experience a fresh take on multiplayer battles with a unique triangular combat system: hunt your prey while escaping your predator in a nonstop cycle of attack, dodge, and strategy.

Step into the magical world of Yoshin Müllen, where three tribes - Earth, Water, and Fire - clash in an ancient rivalry.
Fight as a shaman across mythical arenas, from the Smoky Swamps to the Deadly Jungles and the hidden Crypt beneath the Shaman Temple.
It’s a world of secrets where only the most agile survive.

With its original multiplayer gameplay, colorful cartoon art style, and dynamic soundtrack, Catching Spirits is the perfect choice for your next game night!

• Local multiplayer for up to 3 players: fast, chaotic, and fun!
• Innovative “rock-paper-scissors”-inspired system: a unique 1 vs 1 vs 1 format.
• Easy to play, tough to master: deep mechanics with high skill potential.
• Short, intense matches (around 3 minutes).
• High competitive potential for fierce duels.
• 9 interactive and vibrant environments.
• 12 playable shamans, each with unique powers.
• Over 50 trophies to unlock and secrets to uncover.
• Fully customizable game rules.
• 4 bot levels and 3 AI behaviors to sharpen your skills.
